title: An Old Way to Fight Inflation Gets New Fans
sub_head: Is it time for the U.S. government to impose price controls? History shows that past attempts to rein in rampant inflation with such measures have sometimes worked—when there’s a national will to see them succeed.
body:
In the war against inflation, an old weapon is getting new consideration.
The cost of living has surged more than 8% over the past year in the U.S. and is jumping world-wide.
